auto_play_limit_single_win: Autoplay suspended as you reached your single win limit
auto_play_limit_any_win: Autoplay suspended as you reached your any win limit
auto_play_limit_total_win: Autoplay suspended as you reached your total win limit
err_insufficient_funds: We couldn't accept your bet. Please check your balance or bet limits.
err_max_cap: You've achieved the Maximum Prize in any single credit of (winvalue). Press OK to return to the game.
pays_wild: • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
pays_wildM: • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
scatter_defintion:
• Scatter symbol appears on all reels.
  • 3 or more scatter symbols in any position trigger Free Spins.
auto_play_limit_loss: Autoplay suspended as you reached your loss limit
reality_check_msg: You have been playing for {minutes}. Do you want to continue?
bet_not_available: The Bet is not available now. Please refresh and play again.
general_rule:
• The game has fixed 243 ways and free spins have 1024 ways.
  • The overall game theoretical RTP is rtp.
  • Only the highest win is paid per way.
  • All wins pay left to right.
  • Payouts are made according to the Paytable.
  • All wins are multiplied by the bet per way except the Scatter symbol which is multiplied by the total bet.
  • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
  • The game is played with dynamic paytable.
  • Simultaneous or coinciding wins in different ways are added.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
splash_screen_text_3: WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
splash_screen_text_1: 3 or more Scatter symbols in any position trigger the Free Spins.
messageGenericErrorTitle:
Apologies
It looks like something did not work, but there is no need for concern.
Please, reload the game
Free_game_text:
• 3 or more Scatter symbols in any position trigger the Free Spins.
  • Free Spins can not be retriggered.
  • Free Spins are played at the same Bet as the triggering Spin.
  • During Free Spins All wins are multiplied by x2,x3,x4x5x8 randomly.
falling_wild_definition:
• After a Wild symbol appears on the reels and all bet wins are awarded for that spin, each Wild symbol shifts down one position on the reels and a Falling Wilds Re-Spin is awarded in both main game and free spins.
  • Wild symbols continue to activate Falling Wilds Re-Spins until they disappear from the reels.
  • A Falling Wilds Re-Spin is still awarded on the round when the last Falling Wild symbol falls off the reels on the bottom row.
wild_on_wild_definition:
• In the game, the Wild on Wild feature is activated when a Wild symbol lands behind a Falling Wild.
  • When the Wild on Wild feature is activated, the affected Wild symbol will expand to cover the entire reel and all bet wins are awarded for that spin. Each Wild symbol shifts down one position on the reels.
